name: visa is 20% here 🏖
text:
[@roytang](https://twitter.com/roytang/) SMF is about the discovery of the human brain; Zimmer manages to really zoom in and out from the specific science and individual players to the cultural and societal contexts of the time 



Ogilvy was a smart man with taste, charm, opinions, a mischievous streak & lots of gd sense
